title: Marvel Comic's AI Recap
shortDescription: Scan Marvel comic barcodes, fetch issue data from the Marvel API, and generate AI-powered multi-paragraph recaps for collectors and new readers.
highlights: Built a React + Vite frontend with live camera capture and barcode decoding.
Used Flask backend with local LLMs for supplement decoding and recap generation.

title: PharmaFlex - Biomedical Waste Management Prototype
shortDescription: Prototype system to track biomedical waste, simulate barcode scanning, and automate compliance reporting.
highlights: Implemented backend logic and automation in Python.
Designed a SQLite schema for inventory and compliance data.

title: Top 300 Drug and Bugs Mind Map
shortDescription: Visualization mind map connecting drugs with bacterial and fungal species, built from a structured Excel sheet.
highlights: Transformed dense spreadsheet data into an intuitive visual map.

title: Magic the Gathering Card Detector
shortDescription: Neural network that detects Magic the Gathering cards from user photos, regardless of orientation.
highlights: Worked on designing and training a card recognition model.
Handled orientation invariance for images at arbitrary angles.

title: Virtual Reality Interview Environment
shortDescription: VR office simulation for remote interviewing, focused on accessibility and user experience.
highlights: Built VR office scenes and interactive flows in Unity.

title: Pong Breaker
shortDescription: A game that combines Pong and Brick Breaker, with both single-player and multiplayer modes.
highlights: Used Git for version control and iteration.
